sub_title: Data Management | Clinical Trial Operations | Biotechnology | Project Coordinator
summary:
Media & Communication Bachelor made in Portugal. 
ERAMUS programme made in Universitat de Barcelona.

Experience in Data Management based in Clinical Trial Operations as Data Officer. I worked with Excel & LIMS software as well. At this point my task was processing all the data from the clinical trial; contact the site's as need regarding reconciliations; QC data & delivery Metadata transfer on weekly basis. 

In my actual role in Project Management as Project Coordinator since 2022, my task consists in: assure that the clinical trial project goes smoothly from the day 1 until the end. I'm the contact point/person with the client and between all the departments within Xellerate.


I'm portuguese native. I also speak spanish, english and dutch language.

Focused on growing, professionally and personally.
